Hi everyone,

I'm new in Heritrix and I'm facing the following problem: I c=
reated some warc files, using heritrix 1.14.4. When I open them (using the =
gunzip command) although in the beggining everything is okay, after some th=
ousand lines, something happens with the encoding and I can't read what is =
written. For instance I get this:
<td class=3D"groupOrient" colspan=3D"5"> =
���������&#6=
5533;:�������� &#65=
533;�� ������&#6553=
3;��� ������=
�����</td>

So, do you have any ideas wh=
at I could do to restore the files?

Thanks,
Thomaida
